description:
Simmering classroom unrest over Konno and Tama reaches a boiling point as Aoi steps in, revealing a side of herself that Tomozaki didn`t want to see.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: If You Keep Upgrading Your Initial Equipment, It`ll Usually Become Your Most Powerful Weapon
Shoki Soubi o Kitae Tsuzuketara, Daitai Saikyou no Ken ni Naru
初期装備を鍛え続けたら, だいたい最強の剣になる
